section.title: Part service and editor like behavior
What is the part service?
section.para: The part service allows you to find and perform actions on parts in the application model.
It also allows you to switch perspectives and to create and activate new parts based on part descriptors in the application model.

section.title: Using part descriptors
section.para: The part descriptor model element is a template for the creation of a part. By defining a common set of attributes via such a blueprint it is possible to create concrete instances of it via the part service.
Via the Multiple of the part descriptor you configure if multiple instances of this part can be created or not. Such a model element is depicted in the following screenshot.
